headline: The Cigna Group (CI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Cigna Group on The Passive Income Portfolio’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CI. The Cigna Group’s share was trading at $272.21 as of January 19th. CI’s trailing and forward P/E were 12.05 and 8.94 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: 2 Value Stocks with Promising Prospects and 1 Facing Challenges
summary: Value investing has produced some of the world’s most famous investing billionaires, including Warren Buffett, David Einhorn, and Seth Klarman, who built their fortunes by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.
